information: We offer professional and pragmatic support to international importers in buying fruit of Italian origin. After years of experience in the fresh produce business we have chosen to focus our attention on the references that have been established as the flagship of our fruits: apples, pears, kiwi, grapes and cherries. Our deep knowledge of any traded product and our experience in managing logistic and documentary issues allow us to be a real partner in supporting your import business. MAIN FRESH PRODUCTS: Apples: Red Chief, Royal Gala, Granny Smith, Golden Delicious... Pears: Abate, Conference, William... Kiwi: Hayward, Gold, Soreli... Cherries: Ferrovia, Duroni, More, Napoleon... Grapes: Italia, Thompson, Victoria, Sugarone, Black magic, Red Globe, Crimson.. ITALIAN FOOD ITEMS: Olive Oils: EVOO, DOP, Pomace... Processed Tomatoes: Chopped, Peeled... Canned vegetables: Beans, Artichokes , Dry Tomatoes, Olives... Bottled Water
